name: ElasticLoadBalancingPolicyType
description: The ElasticLoadBalancing policy type is an embedded property of the AWS::ElasticLoadBalancing::LoadBalancer resource. You associate policies with a listener by referencing a policy's name in the listener's PolicyNames property.

properties.name: Attributes
properties.desc: A list of arbitrary attributes for this policy. If you don't need to specify any policy attributes, specify an empty list ([]).

properties.name: InstancePorts
properties.desc: A list of instance ports for the policy. These are the ports associated with the back-end server.

properties.name: LoadBalancerPorts
properties.desc: A list of external load balancer ports for the policy.

properties.name: PolicyName
properties.desc: A name for this policy that is unique to the load balancer.

properties.name: PolicyType
properties.desc: The name of the policy type for this policy. This must be one of the types reported by the Elastic Load Balancing DescribeLoadBalancerPolicyTypes action.
